Name: Ilocos Region
Description: Located in the northwestern part of the Philippines, known for its historical landmarks, beautiful beaches, and natural resources.

Name: Cagayan Valley
Description: A region in the northeastern part of the Philippines, known for its agriculture, especially rice, corn, and tobacco.

Name: Central Luzon
Description: The largest region in Luzon, known for its vast agricultural land and proximity to the national capital region.

Name: CALABARZON
Description: A region in Southern Luzon, known for its growing industries, educational institutions, and natural tourist destinations.

Name: Mimaropa
Description: An island group in the southwestern part of the Philippines, known for its beautiful islands, beaches, and marine biodiversity.

Name: Bicol Region
Description: A region located in the southernmost part of Luzon, known for its active volcanoes, picturesque landscapes, and local delicacies.

Name: Western Visayas
Description: An island region in the central Philippines, famous for its beautiful beaches, historic sites, and vibrant festivals.

Name: Central Visayas
Description: A region in the central Philippines, known for its tourist destinations like Cebu, Bohol, and Siquijor.

Name: Eastern Visayas
Description: A region in the eastern part of the Philippines, known for its natural resources, pristine beaches, and cultural heritage.

Name: Zamboanga Peninsula
Description: A region in the western part of Mindanao, known for its cultural diversity, beautiful coastlines, and rich resources.

Name: Northern Mindanao
Description: A region in the northern part of Mindanao, known for its agriculture, natural resources, and various tourist attractions.

Name: Davao Region
Description: A region in the southeastern part of Mindanao, famous for its rich culture, natural landscapes, and as the home of Mount Apo.

Name: Soccsksargen
Description: A region in the southwestern part of Mindanao, known for its agriculture and diverse culture.

Name: Caraga
Description: A region in the northeastern part of Mindanao, known for its natural resources, scenic beauty, and indigenous cultures.

Name: Autonomous Region in Muslim Mindanao
Description: An autonomous region in the southern part of Mindanao, known for its rich cultural heritage and Muslim population.

Name: National Capital Region
Description: The capital region of the Philippines, encompassing Metro Manila, the political, economic, and cultural center of the country.
